title: jaladhisutA ramaNEna
sahitya:
jaladhi sutA ramaNEna hI sOham sarasamAlingitO nissandEham


caraNam 1    paryankE nija dayata sahitE samupa kalitO nava sumalasitE
    caraNam 2    vAlavyajana virAjita karayA paricaritO nija sadrsha varayA
    caraNam 3    sarasijanAbha harE bahutAntAm kinnu vadAmi gatO mama kAntam
